plugins.name: Wantedly Preflight
plugins.description:
Wantedly Preflight is a Figma plugin that validates your project satisfies the rules of the design system of Wantedly.


Features

  •  Validation ― You can check whether the node is valid just by running the plugin. The result will come out with a detailed message and you can jump into fixing it immediately with a focus button.
  •  Configurable ― Wantedly Preflight has 6+ sophisticated rule and all of them are well-tested. However, in case if you would like to opt-out of some of the rule in your project, you can independently configure items to enable.
  •  Ignore ― Exceptions are always there. On the result page, you have a check button to ignore the specific node. After you ignored a node, it will always be considered appropriate regardless of whether it violates our rules or not.


Our Design System

See Wantedly UI Components

accepted.name: Wantedly
accepted.description: Wantedly, Inc. Design & Editorial Squad - We are shaping a world where work drives passion, through designing products and communications.

plugins.name: Asana Task Creator
plugins.description:
About the Plugin

The Asana Task Creator is a plugin designed to facilitate integration between Figma and Asana, allowing designers and product teams to manage their tasks efficiently and collaboratively. With an intuitive interface, the plugin enables users to create, view, and manage tasks directly within the Figma design environment, eliminating the need to switch between platforms.


Key Features

  1. Secure Authentication: The plugin allows users to register and manage their Personal Access Token from Asana, ensuring secure access to their data.
  2. Data Loading: Automatically load projects and users from Asana, enabling you to choose where to assign your tasks.
  3. Task Creation: Create new tasks directly from Figma, assigning them to specific projects and users with just a few clicks.
  4. Quick Access: A button in the plugin interface allows you to open Asana directly in your browser, providing quick access to all your tasks and projects.


Benefits

  1. Increased Productivity: Centralize your design and task management operations in one place, saving time and effort.
  2. User-Friendly Experience: With a friendly interface, the plugin makes task management accessible to everyone, regardless of technical skill level.


Who Can Use It?

The Asana Task Creator is ideal for design teams, project managers, developers, and anyone using Figma and Asana in their workflow. The streamlined integration between these two platforms helps maintain efficiency and organization in creative projects.


Conclusion

Transform the way you work with the Asana Task Creator and take your task management to the next level. Install the plugin now and discover how the seamless integration between Figma and Asana can revolutionize your productivity and team collaboration!
plugins.tagline: Streamline your workflow by creating Asana tasks directly in Figma

plugins.name: Figma Time Tracker
plugins.description:
Have you ever lost track of time while working in Figma? Our time-tracking plugin is designed to solve this problem.


This plugin allows you to automatically track the time you spend actively working in Figma by recording your interactions based on actions such as cursor movement and document changes. It’s an ideal solution for designers and teams who need to accurately track their time without manual interruptions.


Key Features:


Automatic activity tracking:

  1. The plugin starts tracking time automatically while you interact with the project.
  2. It records actions such as element selection and document changes.


Automatic pause on inactivity:

  1. If there is no activity for 30 seconds, the timer pauses automatically.
  2. It resumes as soon as it detects movement or actions in the file.


Minimalist and floating interface:

  1. Compact size to avoid interfering with your workspace.
  2. Can be freely moved across the screen for convenience.


Tracking control:

  1. A single button to manually pause and resume tracking when needed.


Time tracking in seconds and minutes:

  1. Clear and precise display of elapsed time on the interface.


This plugin is designed to help designers focus on what really matters—creativity—while time tracking is handled automatically and effortlessly.


Optimize your workflow and manage your time more effectively with our Figma tracking plugin!
plugins.tagline: Optimize your work time in Figma with automatic activity tracking.

plugins.name: Text Translator By ChatGPT
plugins.description:
Text Translator 📝 allows you to effortlessly translate your text layers into multiple languages without leaving Figma. Supporting over 130 languages and integrated with the ChatGPT large language model, it provides fast and accurate translations. Preview your designs in different languages, catch localization layout issues early, and adapt your projects for new markets—all within your Figma workspace.


Key Features:

  1. 📝 Mixed Text Style Compatibility — Text Translator preserves the integrity of mixed text styles, ensuring that translated content retains the intended formatting and layout.
  2. 📝 Design-Wide Translation — Easily translate individual text layers or entire sections, groups, or frames for seamless multilingual conversion.
  3. 📝 Table Translation — Instantly translate the text within tables in your designs.
  4. 📝 Support for over 130 languages, enhanced by the ChatGPT large language model for smarter and more accurate translations.
  5. 📝 Integrated with Figma's Quick Actions, allowing you to quickly translate designs without navigating the plugin interface.
  6. 📝 Intelligent selection detection lets you translate entire layers, groups of layers, or specific text within a layer with a single button press.
  7. 📝 Keyboard input mode for translating non-design text such as text variables or quick communication with international teammates.


More

https://aluminum-skate-8b5.notion.site/Text-Translator-Figma-Plugin-12a4265e9ea280adaa79e6045069b709

plugins.name: EventStorming Visualizer
plugins.description:
Unlock the power of EventStorming directly within Figjam!


EventStorming Visualizer seamlessly integrates the practices of EventStorming, helping teams to collaboratively explore complex business domains. With automatic scanning of stickies, intelligent connectors, and real-time visualization, this plugin streamlines your domain-driven design process.


Quick Start Guide:

  1. Platform Selection: Ensure you're on the FigJam platform, as our plugin leverages components exclusive to FigJam.
  2. Initiating with Sticky: Manually drag a sticky onto the canvas. The plugin is optimized to detect yellow, blue, or purple stickies. For beginners, we recommend starting with a yellow sticky, representing an event, as event stickies are frequently used.
  3. Sticky Functionality: Different stickies have unique UI buttons that allow them to perform various tasks.
  4. Building Relationships: Drag and connect various stickies using connectors. Our plugin will automatically document the relationships between each sticky for you.
  5. Exporting Your Work: Once you've completed the event storming process, easily export your data through the UI when no selection is made.


Features:

  1. Auto-Scan Stickies: Automatically identifies and categorizes sticky notes based on their properties, ensuring your EventStorming sessions remain organized.
  2. Intelligent Connectors: Builds relationships between stickies with smart connector logic, enhancing clarity in your domain events, policies, and actions.
  3. Collaborative Highlighting: With multi-user support, track parent-child relationships across the canvas, ensuring synchronous understanding within your team.
  4. Real-time Updates: Ensures everyone is on the same page with synchronized state updates, promoting collaborative efficiency.
  5. Intuitive Message Bus System: Easily publish and subscribe to domain events, furthering your EventStorming expertise.


Harness the combined power of Figma and EventStorming with this essential tool. Perfect for domain-driven design enthusiasts, enterprise architects, and teams looking to drive clarity in complex projects.
plugins.tagline: A FigJam Plugin for Organizing Event Storming Workshops

plugins.name: Variables Editor
plugins.description:
Take control of your variables with the updated Variables Editor plugin. Designed to simplify variable management in Figma, this version lets you edit linked variables directly, avoid complex navigation, and keep your workflow smooth and intuitive.


Key Features:

  1. Edit variables in place: Select any text linked to a variable and start editing it right there — no need to dig through nested structures or remember paths.
  2. Reference-aware updates: Seamlessly edit variables that reference others. Your changes automatically apply to the final target without breaking the original links.
  3. Multi-line inputs with line breaks: Edit values in spacious fields with full support for line breaks, giving you more flexibility than native controls.
  4. Undo changes instantly: Easily revert variable names or values to their previous state with a single click.
  5. Quick variable creation: Add new variables directly to the current collection, right next to the selected variable, without leaving the editing context.
  6. Resizable interface: Adjust the plugin window and input fields to suit your needs, whether working with simple text or complex structures.


Perfect for localization, UI text management, and advanced variable workflows, the Variables Editor plugin is here to help you focus on design, not tedious variable navigation.


How to assign a shortcut to the “Variables Editor” plugin:

  1. Go to System Preferences > Keyboard > Shortcuts.
  2. Select App Shortcuts from the left-hand menu.
  3. Click the + button to create a new shortcut.
  4. Set Application to Figma.
  5. Enter Variables Editor (exact plugin name) in the Menu Title field.
  6. Assign your desired shortcut (e.g., ⌘ + `)
  7. Click Add to confirm.


Your plugin is now accessible using ⌘ + `!
plugins.tagline: Find and edit variables directly in place, without navigating nested structures or losing focus.

plugins.name: 智能文字填充 Smart Text Filler
plugins.description:
Introduction

This plugin allows you to quickly and randomly fill selected text layers with names, locations, or stock symbols, making it ideal for mockups and prototypes.


Function Description

  1. Randomly fill selected text layers with names, locations, or stock symbols.
  2. Each selected text layer receives a unique random value.
  3. Supports multiple text layers in a single operation.


Usage Instructions

  1. Select the text layers you want to fill.
  2. Choose one of the options: names, locations, or stock symbols.
  3. Click the "Fill Text" button to populate the selected text layers with random values.


Notes

  1. Make sure the selected text layers are editable.
  2. The plugin will preserve the original font and text styles.

plugins.name: DeckBot
plugins.description:
DeckBot is a simple plugin that will take a set of selected frames, and automatically set a click interaction to advance from one frame to the next in presentation mode. Instead of manually dragging links from one frame to the next one at a time, all you have to do is select the frames you want to include in your presentation, and DeckBot will do the rest!


Instructions

  • Select two or more frames on the page
  • Run DeckBot
  • Optionally adjust the order of your selected frames in the DeckBot popup
  • Click “create deck”
  • Launch presentation mode to see your new deck!


Additional Features

  • DeckBot is undoable
  • Any existing interactions set on elements inside your selected frames will be preserved


How to reach out and support

Having issues? DM me on Twitter @mklickman1


---


DISCLAIMER: This plugin is presented as-is, so use at your own risk!


While I do my best to test as many edge cases as possible, I am certain there are scenarios I haven’t accounted for yet, but I welcome your feedback and suggestions. This began as a personal project I put together in my free time, and I will support as my time allows, but I cannot guarantee I will be able to address all concerns in a timely manner, so please take that into consideration as you use the plugin and provide feedback.
plugins.tagline: Create click interactions between frames with one click

plugins.name: BrandCentral Inspect
plugins.description: The BrandCentral Plugin is our in-house solution designed to seamlessly bridge the gap between our design and development teams, streamlining the conversion of Figma design components into ready-to-use CSS/SCSS code. By offering a unique method that translates text styles and visual properties directly into SCSS mixins and CSS classes following the BEM methodology, our plugin aims to revolutionize how development projects integrate design. Features include automatic conversion of component names to kebab-case, smart typography style mapping, and support for component variants and states, all automated to speed up the development workflow and ensure design consistency across all project aspects. Enhance efficiency, minimize redo's, and keep our teams in sync with the BrandCentral Plugin.
plugins.tagline: From Figma to Development

MacroNow! is an innovative plugin designed to revolutionize your workflow in Figma by providing robust automation capabilities. Tailored for designers and teams, this plugin allows you to seamlessly record and recreate any series of actions within Figma, significantly boosting efficiency and productivity.


Key Features:

Play Macro: Recreate your recorded actions with a single click using the Play Macro button. This feature allows you to automate repetitive tasks, ensuring consistency and saving valuable time.


User-Friendly Interface: Designed with simplicity in mind, MacroNow! offers an easy-to-use interface that integrates smoothly into your Figma workspace. Begin recording and playing macros without a steep learning curve.


Early Stage Functionality: As an early-stage plugin, MacroNow! is continuously evolving. We are committed to expanding its features based on user feedback, ensuring it meets the dynamic needs of the Figma community.


Benefits:

Enhanced Productivity: Automate routine tasks to focus on creativity and innovation.

Consistency and Precision: Ensure that repetitive actions are performed accurately every time.

Time-Saving: Reduce the time spent on manual, repetitive tasks, allowing for more efficient project completion.

MacroNow! is the perfect companion for any Figma user looking to streamline their design process through powerful automation. Join us in this early stage and help shape the future of design automation with your valuable feedback.

plugins.name: Find decimal point
plugins.description:
The Decimal Point Detector is a useful tool for designers working with Figma. It automates the process of locating and highlighting components on your Figma pages that have decimal points in their x, y, width, or height properties. These components are typically difficult to align perfectly on a pixel grid and might cause issues with your design layout.

Upon running the plugin, it traverses through each element on your Figma project pages. If it finds any components with decimal points, it places a customizable warning box over them with the text "DO NOT USE DECIMAL POINT". This clear visual indicator can help you quickly identify and fix any elements causing potential issues.

The warning box and text colors are customizable through a simple user interface. Users can choose their preferred color for the box and the warning text. By default, the warning box color is yellow (#FFCC00) and the warning text color is red (#FF0000). These colors can be adjusted using the color input fields in the UI, allowing for a personalized user experience.

If no components with decimal points are found in your project, the plugin will send a notification stating "Perfect components!", offering you reassurance about your design consistency.

The Decimal Point Detector plugin is an invaluable tool for maintaining precision and avoiding potential alignment issues in your Figma designs. It streamlines the design process by automating an essential aspect of design consistency, allowing you to focus on your creative process.
plugins.tagline: Find decimal point on artboard

plugins.name: Figma to JSON Exporter
plugins.description:
Figma to JSON Exporter is a powerful plugin that converts your Figma designs into comprehensive, structured JSON data. Perfect for designers and developers who need to extract detailed design information for documentation, analysis, or development workflows.


✨ Key Features:

Complete Design Extraction - Captures all visual properties, layout data, typography, and component information

Dual Mode Support - Works seamlessly in both Design and Dev modes within Figma

Structured Output - Generates clean, organized JSON with design tokens and component hierarchy

Developer-Friendly - Perfect for integration with Visual Studio Code and other development tools

Comprehensive Data - Includes colors, fonts, spacing, effects, Auto Layout properties, and component relationships


🔧 Use Cases:

Design Documentation - Create detailed design system documentation

Development Handoff - Bridge design-to-code workflows

Design Analysis - Analyze and audit existing designs

Tool Integration - Import design data into custom development tools

Design System Management - Extract and organize design tokens


🎨 How It Works:

Simply select any design element in Figma and export its complete structure as a downloadable JSON file. The plugin extracts every detail from individual components to complex nested layouts, making it easy to understand and recreate designs programmatically.

Compatible with Figma Design Mode, Dev Mode, and perfect for Visual Studio Code integration.
plugins.tagline: Transform Figma designs into structured JSON data

plugins.name: OKLCH Color Ramp
plugins.description:
Overview

The OKLCH Color Ramp Generator is a powerful Figma plugin designed to help designers create beautiful, perceptually uniform color scales using the OKLCH color space. This innovative tool addresses the common challenge of creating consistent and visually pleasing color ramps in design systems.


Key Features


1. Advanced Color Space Implementation

- Utilizes the OKLCH color space, which offers superior color interpolation compared to traditional RGB or HSL

- Ensures perceptually uniform steps between colors, making the resulting ramps more visually harmonious

- Provides more accurate color relationships, especially important for accessibility and design system consistency


2. User-Friendly Interface

- Simple and intuitive input system for base colors

- Customizable number of steps in the color ramp (default: 12)

- One-click generation of complete color scales


3. Smart Layout and Organization

- Automatically arranges color swatches in a horizontal layout

- Includes color information display (hex codes and intended OKLCH values)

- Automatic selection and zoom to the generated color ramp

- Clean, organized presentation of color information


Benefits for Designers


1. Time Efficiency

- Rapid generation of color scales

- Eliminates manual color interpolation

- Reduces the chance of errors in color calculations


2. Design Quality

- Ensures consistent visual steps between colors

- Creates more accessible color combinations

- Maintains color harmony across the design system


3. Workflow Integration

- Seamlessly fits into existing Figma workflows

- Provides immediate visual feedback

- Easy to iterate and adjust color scales


Future Development

The plugin is actively maintained with planned improvements:

- Enhanced color information display

- Additional customization options for color ramp generation

- Request feature in comments
plugins.tagline: Generate stunning, perceptually uniform color ramps effortlessly.

plugins.name: Quick Frames
plugins.description:
Quick Frames has a vast library of device frame sizes. Figma defaults are very limited and Figma does not allow users to create and save their own set of device screen resolutions. I just put down a collection so you don't have to google them every time.


Why Quick Frames?

Figma currently lacks built-in support for a comprehensive device frame library.


Why did I build this?

Because I was bored and wanted to build something. I remember sharing a feedback on figma community forum few years ago and its still pending. So decided to make one for it.


Note: This plugin will become useless if Figma decides to support this feature. Till then, enjoy using it.


Reach out to me on Linkedin if you with to connect with me to work on a plugin / share feedback / simply to network 😊

Using Vitality AI is a breeze. Simply run the plugin, wait for it to load, then describe your design and click generate. Avoid clicking elsewhere to prevent interference during the design process. include prefix or suffix to the number.


Example:

max: 200, min: 0

prefix: "U$ "

result: U$ 100

plugins.name: Marq
plugins.description:
Introducing Marq - Your Tagging Companion for Figma


Marq is a powerful Figma plugin designed to streamline your design workflow and boost productivity. With Marq, you can easily add tags, emojis, and colors to your Figma elements, making organization and collaboration a breeze.


Key Features:

  1. Tagging Made Simple: Marq lets you tag your Figma objects effortlessly. Whether it's marking elements with emojis, text, or both, Marq's intuitive interface makes tagging a breeze.
  2. Rich Emojis Library: Choose from a wide range of emojis to add personality and clarity to your designs.
  3. Color Your Tags: Customize your tags with vibrant colors. Highlight important elements or categorize your designs with a rainbow of options.
  4. Save Presets: Marq allows you to save your favorite tag combinations as presets. No need to recreate the same tags repeatedly; simply apply your saved presets in a click.
  5. Flexible Application: Apply tags and presets to selected objects or the page name, ensuring consistency across your Figma projects.
  6. Real-time Updates: Stay informed with real-time notifications as you tag and apply presets. Marq keeps you in the loop at every step.


Why Marq?

  1. Effortless Organization: Keep your designs tidy and well-structured with clear, visual tags.
  2. Improved Collaboration: Communicate design ideas more effectively with emojis and colors.
  3. Time-Saving Presets: Save time by reusing your favorite tag combinations.
  4. Enhanced Productivity: Streamline your workflow and focus on what matters most—designing.


Say goodbye to cluttered Figma files and hello to a more organized, efficient design process. Try Marq today and elevate your Figma experience!
plugins.tagline: Simplify page and frame management in figma

plugins.name: Figma to Junction
plugins.description:
Globalize Your Designs

Globalize your work through seamless organization. Transfer written content of your designs from Figma into Junction and easily access all translated versions of the text from one location. 


Visual Context

Preview your design for visual context of translations


Get Started:

1. Launch the Plug-in

Click on the plug-in and log in with the demo account. Follow the plug-in instructions to choose a project and transfer your design to Junction.


2. Preview Your Work in Junction

Log in to Junction using the demo account below. You can view your design work in the “Screens” section under the Figma Demo project.

plugins.name: Figma to React Native Variables
plugins.description:
Figma to React Native Variables is a plugin that simplifies the process of converting design tokens (e.g., colors, typography, spacing) into a format suitable for React Native development. Ensure consistency between design and code with just a few clicks. Perfect for teams aiming to bridge the gap between designers and developers.


Figma to React Native Variablesは、デザイントークン（例: 色、タイポグラフィ、間隔）をReact Native開発に適した形式に変換するプロセスを簡素化するプラグインです。数回のクリックでデザインとコードの一貫性を実現します。デザイナーと開発者の間のギャップを埋めたいチームに最適です。
plugins.tagline: Simplify your workflow: Quickly copy Figma variables for use in React Native projects.

plugins.name: Frame Organizer
plugins.description:
This plugin is ideal for cleaning up frames that are slightly misaligned when creating documents.


It adjusts the spacing between frames horizontally and vertically while maintaining the overall layout. You can set the horizontal and vertical margins and the amount of misalignment to ignore.


資料作成などで、並んでいるフレームがすこしだけがたがたしているのを綺麗にするのに最適なプラグインです。


全体の大まかなレイアウトは維持したまま、横方向、縦方向のフレーム間の間隔を調整します。横方向、縦方向のマージンや、無視するズレの大きさを設定可能です。
plugins.tagline: Clean Frame Alignment

plugins.name: D2Code
plugins.description:
Features

  • default Code Generation： Support react + tailwind, react native +tailwind。 react native +style。 conversion effect preview。
  • component conversion Support：Mark the component to convert the corresponding custom component code。 create libs json info.
  • code with image url：By configuring filekey and token, it can be displayed with pictures in the design diagram.
  • easily custom DSL: such as flutter, vue, swift
  • D2C2D：Precipitate the marked figma componentSet, and libs json, which can greatly improve development efficiency


  • 默认代码模版：支持react + tailwind、react native +tailwind。react native +style。转换效果预览。
  • 组件转换支持：通过标记组件，转换出对应的自定义组件代码。如何创建libs json info
  • 生成代码image自带url:通过配置filekey和token，可以在生成代码中用真实图片url
  • 非常容易的自定义代码转换模版：如 flutter、vue、swift、小程序等
  • D2C2D：沉淀出标记好的figma componentSet，以及libs json，可以大大提高开发效率。



How to use

  • d2code document
  • Selecting a layer will automatically convert out the code
  • mark the layer's name with "#CustomComponent" such as "#Button"
  • Copy and paste or save code file to you demo or project
  • After the test is perfect, package the custom component, write libs json, and let the designer precipitate componentset with mark


  • d2code 文档说明地址
  • 通过选择视图后将会自动转换出代码
  • 使用 "#CustomComponent" 如 通过标记视图名称后可转换出代码
  • 复制或者导出代码到 demo 或 工程中
  • 测试完善后，打包自定义组件，编写libs json，让设计者沉淀出带标记的ComponentSet



Tips:

  • Currently only autolayout is supported, non-autolayout will be supported in the future
  • Try to keep the layer structure as simple as possible to avoid overlapping layers


  • 目前只支持 autolayout， 不是autolayout 将来会做支持
  • 设计师尽可能使用 层级简单的布局方式
plugins.tagline: Design to code. easily customize conversion rules. Highly reusable code.设计稿转代码。自定义转换规则。代码复用性极高。
